title: Remove sliding/scrollbar UI element from the app

requirements.text: Remove the sliding bar (progress bar, scroll indicator, or any sliding UI element) that appears in the app interface. Ensure its removal does not break the layout or navigation of any existing views (Dashboard, Create Trip, Reports, Vehicles).
acceptanceCriteria: The sliding bar element is no longer visible anywhere in the app
All four navigation views (Dashboard, Create Trip, Reports, Vehicles) render correctly without the sliding bar
The overall layout and spacing are not broken after removal
No console errors related to the removed element

constraints: Do not modify any files listed under frontend.immutablePaths
Do not change any existing navigation logic or multi-page layout behavior
nonGoals: Adding or modifying any navigation tabs or links
